attributes.action: reject euphemisms such as "flexible" as in "the UK has a flexible labour market..."
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What does "flexible" actually mean?  Please explain. Explanation is a legitimate and non-humorous government function.  I know what "flexible" means!  Who else does?

rejection.details: Your petition has no point about government policy.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
